mapper.select: select cafeNo, themeNo, themeName from theme where cafeNo = #{cafeNo} order by themeNo asc

select ttbl.themeNo, ttbl.themename, ttbl.themetimeno, ttbl.themetime, rtbl.reserveDate, rtbl.reserveTimeNo, rtbl.reserveDateNo, rtbl.reserveTime, nvl(rtbl.reserveState, 1) reserveState from ( select t.themeNo, t.themename, tt.themetimeno, tt.themetime from theme t, themetime tt where t.themeNo = tt.themeNo and t.themeNo = #{themeNo}) ttbl, ( select t.themeNo, rd.reserveDateNo, rd.themeNo, rd.reserveDate, rt.reserveTimeNo, rt.reserveTime, rt.reserveState from theme t, reservedate rd, reservetime rt where t.themeNo = rd.themeNo and rd.reserveDateNo = rt.reserveDateNo and rd.themeNo = #{themeNo} and rd.reserveDate = #{reserveDate}) rtbl where ttbl.themetime = rtbl.reserveTime(+) order by themeTimeNo asc
select reserveTimeNo, reserveDateNo, reserveTime, reserveState from reserveTime where reserveDateNo = #{reserveDateNo} and reserveTime = #{reserveTime}

select c.cafeName, t.themeImg, t.themeName, to_char(rd.reserveDate, 'yyyymmdd') reserveDate, t.themeNo, r.reserveNo, r.reservePerson, r.reserveName, r.reserveHp, to_char(r.payment,'999,999') payment, rt.reserveTime from cafe c, theme t, reserveDate rd, reserveTime rt, reserve r where c.cafeNo = t.cafeno and t.themeNo = rd.themeno and rd.reservedateno = rt.reservedateno and rt.reservetimeno = r.reservetimeno and reserveNo = #{reserveNo}
mapper.update: update (select rt.reserveState, r.paymentState from reserveTime rt, reserve r where rt.reserveTimeNo = r.reserveTimeNo and r.reserveNo = #{reserveNo}) set reserveState = 1
mapper.select: select p.gameState from reserve r, preRecord p where p.reserveNo = #{reserveNo} and rownum = 1
